frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-disable-hover-on-app-window-switcher-popups
frozen.shortDescription: Prevents the mouse cursor interfering with either the App Switcher or the Window Switcher popups. For those users that like to use the keyboard only with these switchers.
frozen.longDescription:
Prevents the mouse cursor interfering with either the App Switcher or the Window Switcher popups. For those users that like to use the keyboard only with these switchers.
Note: It doesn't prevent mouse clicks.

These are the switcher popups that are invoked from keyboard shortcuts, e.g. Alt+Tab or Super+Tab.
